column6: Ultimate Spider-Man faces off with Mysterio! It's brutal, it's bloody and it's one of the biggest Spidey fights of the year!  PLUS: Events in Kitty Pryde's life create a situation for Peter Parker that you have never ever ever seen in a Spidey title before!   Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:David Lafuente Garcia | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
